KeysToEntries.Artisan.MagicalMending.Desc: Throw your items down and repair them instantly through the power of Nature Magic.
KeysToEntries.Artisan.DecoratedAdventurer.Desc: Unlocks the Armour Mannequin and Cape Rack, allowing you to display all of your Armour Sets and Capes with pride!
KeysToEntries.Artisan.Superheat.Desc: Cast on fire-based stations to empower them and boost their processing speed for a while.
KeysToEntries.Artisan.MagicalMending.Name: Magical Mending
KeysToEntries.Artisan.BarkToBones.Desc: Use Alchemy to Transmute a tree into a stack of bones for all your grisly needs.
KeysToEntries.Artisan.BarkToBones.Name: Bark to Bones
KeysToEntries.Artisan.MakeItLast.Name: Make it last
KeysToEntries.Artisan.DecoratedAdventurer.Name: Decorated Adventurer
KeysToEntries.Artisan.Superheat.Name: Superheat
KeysToEntries.Attack.Adaptability.Name: Adaptability
KeysToEntries.Attack.Adaptability.Desc: Evading or blocking no longer interrupts your combos when using a melee weapon!
KeysToEntries.Attack.EnchantWeaponAir.Name: Enchant Weapon: Air
KeysToEntries.Attack.EnchantWeaponAir.Desc: Enchant your current Melee weapon with the power of Air! Increases your Melee Weapon's Attack Speed.
KeysToEntries.Attack.EnchantWeaponFire.Name: Enchant Weapon: Fire
KeysToEntries.Attack.EnchantWeaponFire.Desc: Enchant your current Melee weapon with the power of Fire! Apply Burning to Enemies with Critical Hits!
KeysToEntries.Attack.LesserPotion.Name: Attack Potion
KeysToEntries.Attack.LesserPotion.Desc: Unlock the recipe for the Attack Potion at the Brewing Cauldron.
KeysToEntries.Attack.WeaponExpertise.Name: Weapon Expertise
KeysToEntries.Attack.WeaponExpertise.Desc: Unlocks additional attacks for all Melee Weapons.
KeysToEntries.Attack.SpecialActions.Name: Melee Weapon Special Actions
KeysToEntries.Attack.SpecialActions.Desc: Unlocks unique Special Actions for Melee weapons!
KeysToEntries.Attack.Parry.Name: Parry
KeysToEntries.Attack.Parry.Desc: Parry attacks by blocking at the last moment to stagger your Enemies and deal increased damage!
KeysToEntries.Attack.CombatProficiency.Name: Combat Proficiency
KeysToEntries.Attack.CombatProficiency.Desc: Stamina cost reduction for melee attacks
KeysToEntries.Attack.TempestShield.Name: Tempest Shield
KeysToEntries.Attack.TempestShield.Desc: Conjure a Shield of Air Magic that prevents all damage while blocking for a limited time, triggering a powerful burst when the spell ends. Attack levels increase duration.
KeysToEntries.Attack.TrainingDummy.Name: Training Dummy
KeysToEntries.Attack.TrainingDummy.Desc: Unlocks the ability to build a Training Dummy to test your melee weapons on.
KeysToEntries.Attack.WeaponRack.Name: Weapon Rack
KeysToEntries.Attack.WeaponRack.Desc: Unlocks the ability to build a Weapon Rack to display your weapons.
KeysToEntries.Attack.Whetstone.Name: Whetstone
KeysToEntries.Attack.Whetstone.Desc: Allows crafting of whetstones at the Crafting Table, which can be used to sharpen melee weapons for increased damage!
KeysToEntries.Construction.CreatureComforts.Name: Creature Comforts
KeysToEntries.Construction.CreatureComforts.Desc: Unlocks an assortment of furniture and decorations.
KeysToEntries.Construction.EyeOfOculus.Name: Eye Of Oculus
KeysToEntries.Construction.EyeOfOculus.Desc: Become the mystical Eye of Oculus and build Structures easier and with a whole new perspective!
KeysToEntries.Construction.FineDetails.Name: Fine Details
KeysToEntries.Construction.MiddleGround.Name: Middle Ground
KeysToEntries.Construction.Oak.Name: Mighty Oak
KeysToEntries.Construction.Oak.Desc: Unlocks the next tier of building pieces.
KeysToEntries.Construction.PersonalChest.Name: Personal Chest
KeysToEntries.Construction.PersonalChest.Desc: Access your Personal Storage chest from anywhere.
KeysToEntries.Construction.SacredGeometry.Name: Sacred Geometry
KeysToEntries.Construction.SummonShelter.Name: Summon Shelter
KeysToEntries.Construction.SummonShelter.Desc: Construct a temporary Shelter through the power of Astral Magic. It even has a Bed!
KeysToEntries.Cooking.BonesToPeaches.Name: Bones to Peaches
KeysToEntries.Cooking.BonesToPeaches.Desc: Transmute unwanted bones on the ground into fresh Peaches for your consumption. Inhumane? Yes... but delicious!
KeysToEntries.Cooking.Gastronomy.Name: Gastronomy
KeysToEntries.Cooking.Gastronomy.Desc: Increased chance of cooking Delicious Food
KeysToEntries.Cooking.FancyCookware.Name: Fancy Cookware
KeysToEntries.Cooking.FancyCookware.Desc: Unlocks furniture piece Pan Rack in the building menu.
KeysToEntries.Cooking.InternalAlchemy.Name: Internal Alchemy
KeysToEntries.Cooking.InternalAlchemy.Desc: Refreshes any active Food and Drink buffs with a spectacular display of culinary appreciation.
KeysToEntries.Cooking.YesChef.Name: Yes, Chef!
KeysToEntries.Cooking.YesChef.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Chef's Hat, craftable at the Crafting Station.
KeysToEntries.Mining.PrecissionStrikes.Name: Precision Strikes
KeysToEntries.Mining.CrumbledWalls.Name: Mine Crumbled Walls
KeysToEntries.Mining.CrumbledWalls.Desc: Allows you to knock down crumbled walls with a pickaxe, granting access to hidden or blocked areas.
KeysToEntries.Mining.DetectOre.Name: Summon Stone Spirits
KeysToEntries.Mining.DetectOre.Desc: Call on the Stone Spirits to guide you to the nearest rocks you can mine!
KeysToEntries.Mining.GemProspector.Name: Gem Prospector
KeysToEntries.Mining.GemProspector.Desc: Mining ore now sometimes produces precious gemstones.
KeysToEntries.Mining.OreWeight.Name: Not-So-Heavy Metal
KeysToEntries.Mining.OreWeight.Desc: The weight of metal ores is reduced by 25%
KeysToEntries.Mining.Rocksplosion.Name: Rocksplosion
KeysToEntries.Mining.Rocksplosion.Desc: Conjure a powerful blast to break apart stone boulders and ore.
KeysToEntries.Mining.StoneWeight.Name: Lift With Your Hips
KeysToEntries.Mining.StoneWeight.Desc: The weight of stone, clay, and sand raw material is reduced by 25%
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.EarthRunes.Name: Earth Runes
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.EarthRunes.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Earth Runes, craftable at the Rune Altar.
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.FireRunes.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Fire Runes, craftable at the Rune Altar.
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.FireRunes.Name: Fire Runes
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.FireSpirit.Name: Fire Spirit
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.FireSpirit.Desc: Conjure forth a fire spirit to light your way.
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.LawRunes.Name: Law Runes
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.LawRunes.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Law Runes, craftable at the Rune Altar.
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.NatureRunes.Name: Nature Runes
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.NatureRunes.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Nature Runes, craftable at the Rune Altar.
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.EssentialStrength.Name: Essential Strength
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.EssentialStrength.Desc: The weight of rune essence is reduced by 50%
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.Windstep.Name: Windstep
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.Windstep.Desc: Summons the power of Air Magic to Jump higher and Descend slower.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.AxtralProjection.Name: Axtral Projection
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.AxtralProjection.Desc: Conjures an Astral Axe and launches it forward, instantly chopping down trees in its path.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.BirdNests.Name: Bird Nests
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.BirdNests.Desc: It is now possible to find bird nests while felling trees. Bird nests contain useful items.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.ChopVines.Name: Chop Thorny Vines
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.ChopVines.Desc: Allows you to cut down thorny vines with a hatchet, granting access to hidden or blocked areas.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.LumberStorage.Name: Lumber Storage
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.LumberStorage.Desc: You can now build the lumber storage, a very high capacity storage for logs and planks.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.OverheadChop.Name: Overhead Chop
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.OverheadChop.Desc: You can now perform an overhead chop, which deals greater damage against fallen logs, but very little damage against trees.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.Splinter.Name: Splinter
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.Splinter.Desc: A powerful spell that chops fallen trees into wood logs.
KeysToEntries.Woodcutting.LumberjackStamina.Name: Lumberjack Stamina
KeysToEntries.Cooking.MinorNode.Stat1: Delicious Food Chance at the Cooking Range
KeysToEntries.Magic.Confuse.Name: Confuse
KeysToEntries.Magic.Confuse.Desc: Twist the minds of lesser enemies, making them unable to distinguish between friends and foes for a limited time.
KeysToEntries.Magic.ExtendCombo.Name: Arcane Expertise
KeysToEntries.Magic.ExtendCombo.Desc: Unlocks an additional powerful magical attack at the end of staff magic combos.
KeysToEntries.Magic.FireMagic.Name: Fire Magic
KeysToEntries.Magic.FireMagic.Desc: Wield the destructive forces of fire. Equip Fire runes to burn your enemies to ash in combat.
KeysToEntries.Magic.LesserPotionMagic.Name: Magic Potion
KeysToEntries.Magic.LesserPotionMagic.Desc: Unlock the recipe for the Magic Potion at the Brewing Cauldron.
KeysToEntries.Magic.SecondaryAttacks.Name: Secondary Attacks
KeysToEntries.Magic.SecondaryAttacks.Desc: Charge up and release powerful secondary staff spells.
KeysToEntries.Magic.Surge.Name: Surge
KeysToEntries.Magic.Surge.Desc: Channel arcane power into your dodges, travelling further and evading longer as a result.
KeysToEntries.Magic.Surge.Upgrade.Desc: Distract your enemies by leaving behind an illusionary image for a short time when you use your first Surge Charge.
KeysToEntries.Magic.Surge.Upgrade.Name: Afterimage
KeysToEntries.Magic.MagicFocus.Desc: Allows crafting of magic focus at the Crafting Table, which can be used to imbue magic staves to increase their damage!
KeysToEntries.Magic.MagicFocus.Name: Magic Focus
KeysToEntries.Magic.RuneRefund.Name: Runic Refund
KeysToEntries.Magic.RuneRefund.Desc: Your greater understanding of magic gives you a 30% chance to preserve runes when attacking with magic.
KeysToEntries.Magic.GreaterConfuse.Name: Greater Confuse
KeysToEntries.Magic.GreaterConfuse.Desc: The Confuse spell now works on a wider variety of creatures.
KeysToEntries.Magic.StaminaStat.Name: Magic Stamina Stat
KeysToEntries.Ranged.CorruptionArrows.Name: Spectral Arrows
KeysToEntries.Ranged.CorruptionArrows.Desc: Enchant your equipped bow with Astral Magic, causing arrows to penetrate through multiple targets.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ShadowVeil.Name: Shadow Veil
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ShadowVeil.Desc: Make yourself invisible to enemies for a short period.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.SnareTrap.Name: Snare
KeysToEntries.Ranged.SnareTrap.Desc: Conjure Earth Magic at your feet and lay a trap for your Enemies! Those caught inside this trap become rooted in place for a short time.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.VenomousTrapper.Name: Venomous Trapper
KeysToEntries.Ranged.VenomousTrapper.Desc: The Snare trap now triggers a cloud of poison when it is activated, causing enemies stuck inside it to become poisoned over time.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.CorruptionShot.Name: Corruption Shot
KeysToEntries.Ranged.CorruptionShot.Desc: Fully-charged Spectral Arrows additionally Corrupt the target, granting extra damage to hits from Spectral Arrows for a short period.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.RangedProjectileRefundChance.Name: Ammo Recovery Chance
KeysToEntries.Ranged.RangedProjectileRefundChance.Desc: Adds a chance to be able to retrieve your arrows or bolts from your enemy's loot when they die.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.HuntersSense.Name: Hunter's Sense
KeysToEntries.Ranged.HuntersSense.Desc: Crouch for a short time to activate your Hunter Senses, allowing you to sense nearby Creatures and Enemies.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.QuickAction.Name: Quick Action
KeysToEntries.Ranged.QuickAction.Desc: Perform Quick Actions with Ranged Weapons using the Primary Action button.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ToxicBehaviour.Name: Toxic Behaviour
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ToxicBehaviour.Desc: Unlocks the recipe for Weapon Poison, which can be used to imbue melee weapons with Poison or to craft Poisonous Arrows.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.MakeEmBleed.Name: Make 'em Bleed
KeysToEntries.Ranged.MakeEmBleed.Desc: Unlocks the recipe for Weapon Barbs, which can be used to imbue melee weapons with Bleed or to craft Barbed Arrows.
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ArcheryTarget.Name: Archery Target
KeysToEntries.Ranged.ArcheryTarget.Desc: Build an Archery Target to practice your Ranged accuracy against. Shoot the Bullseye for a surprise!
KeysToEntries.Ranged.TrickShot.Name: Trick Shot
KeysToEntries.Ranged.TrickShot.Desc: After firing a fully draw arrow, release follow up shots at the right time for increased damage!
KeysToEntries.Ranged.TrickShot.Upgrade.Name: Crossbow Trick Shot
KeysToEntries.Ranged.TrickShot.Upgrade.Desc: Trick Shot now applies to Crossbow Weapons. Fire at the right time to instantly finish reloading and ready your next shot!
KeysToEntries.Ranged.EnchantedCrossbowBolts.Name: Enchanted Crossbow Bolts
KeysToEntries.Ranged.EnchantedCrossbowBolts.Desc: Unlocks the ability to craft Enchanted Crossbow Bolts. Enchanted bolts have a chance of triggering unique magical effects when being fired!
KeysToEntries.Ranged.FireStarter.Name: Fire Starter
KeysToEntries.Ranged.FireStarter.Desc: Unlocks the Fire Oil and Fire Arrows Recipes, giving you new ways to burn your enemies to ash!
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.WaterRunes.Name: Water Runes
KeysToEntries.Runecrafting.WaterRunes.Desc: Unlocks recipe for Water Runes, craftable at the Rune Altar.
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.Name: Gastronomic Gains
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T1.Description: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 1 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T1T2.Descriptio: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 1 & 2 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T2.Description: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 2 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T2T3.Descriptio: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 2 & 3 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T3.Description: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 3 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Cooking.ChanceToBurn.Major.T2.Name: Culinary Confidence: Power Level 2
KeysToEntries.Cooking.ChanceToBurn.Major.T3.Name: Culinary Confidence: Power Level 3
KeysToEntries.Cooking.AdeptCulinaromancer.Name: Adept Culinaromancer
KeysToEntries.Cooking.Teamonger.Name: Teamonger
KeysToEntries.Cooking.AmateurCulinaromancer.Name: Amateur Culinaromancer
KeysToEntries.Cooking.AmateurCulinaromancer.Descriptio: Unlocks a collection of Perk granting recipes at the Stone Range and Range.
KeysToEntries.Farming.Harvest.Name: Uproot
KeysToEntries.Farming.Harvest.Desc: Channeling the power of the earth, summon a spectral surge that gently coaxes ripe plants from the soil. Within a small radius, all fully grown crops and wild plants are instantly harvested and drawn towards you
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GrillMaster.Name: Grill Master
KeysToEntries.Farming.Harvest.Upgrade.Name: Harvester
KeysToEntries.Farming.Harvest.Upgrade.Desc: With greater mastery over the land, the caster’s reach extends even further. Harvester expands Uproot’s range to a wider radius
KeysToEntries.Farming.Humidify.Name: Humidify
KeysToEntries.Farming.Humidify.Desc: Conjure Water magic to create a rain cloud that travels forward, instantly watering any Farming Plot that it passes over with Clean Water.
KeysToEntries.Cooking.ChanceToBurn.Major.T4.Name: Culinary Confidence: Power Level 4
KeysToEntries.Cooking.GastronomicGains.T4.Description: Reduces the chance to Burn Power Level 4 Ingredients
KeysToEntries.Construction.AdvancedStone.Name: Bastion
